description.value:
The force of a waves shamanâ€™s water spells can bring even the mightiest of foes to the ground. When the shaman casts a spell with the water descriptor, she does so at 1 caster level higher. If that spell deals damage, the target must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw or be knocked prone.

At 8th level, the shaman casts water spells at 2 caster levels higher.

At 16th level, her ability to knock creatures prone extends to any spell that deals damage.
